Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
Vehicle
public class Vehicle extends Object
Dominick Vician, CEN-3024C-24204, February 17th, 2025 Vehicle.java This class contains all the information that is relevant to a specific vehicle, a VIN, a make, a model, production year, current mileage, initial price, and color as well as the methods required to set and access that information.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(Integer vin, String make, String model, Integer year, Integer mileage, Double price, String color)
      Vehicle - Constructs a new Vehicle with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      vin - An Integer containing the Vehicle Identification Number.
      make - A String containing the make of the vehicle (e.g., Toyota, Dodge).
      model - A String containing the model of the vehicle (e.g., Prius, Charger).
      year - An int representing the year the vehicle was manufactured.
      mileage - An int representing the total mileage of the vehicle.
      price - A double representing the original price of the vehicle.
      color - A String representing the color of the vehicle (e.g., Red, Neon Pink).

    • computeCurrentPrice

      public double computeCurrentPrice(double depRate, int currentYear)
      Computes the current price of the vehicle using a depreciation formula. Formula: currentPrice = originalPrice * (1 - depRate)^age, where age = currentYear - year.
      Parameters:
      depRate - A double representing the depreciation rate (e.g., 0.1 for 10%).
      currentYear - An int representing the current year.
      Returns:
      double representing the computed current price.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides the default toString to return a string representation of the Vehicle object in the format "vin, make, model, year, mileage, price, color".
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String representing the vehicle's details.
